testCases.title: Valid Login with Correct Username and Password
testCases.description: Verifies the successful authentication of a user with correct credentials.
steps: Navigate to login page
Enter valid username in the username field
Enter valid password in the password field
Click on 'Login' button
Expect successful redirection or welcome message

testCases.title: Invalid Login with Incorrect Password
testCases.description: Verifies that a user cannot log in with incorrect credentials.
steps: Navigate to login page
Enter valid username in the username field
Enter invalid password in the password field
Click on 'Login' button
Expect error message indicating invalid credentials

testCases.title: Empty Fields for Username and Password
testCases.description: Ensures that the login form does not accept empty fields.
steps: Navigate to login page
Leave username field blank
Enter password in the password field
Click on 'Login' button
Expect error message indicating that both fields are required

testCases.title: Password Visibility Toggle Test
testCases.description: Verifies the functionality of password visibility toggle.
steps: Navigate to login page
Enter valid credentials in username and password fields
Click on 'Show Password' button
Expect displayed passwords as *****

testCases.title: Remember Me Functionality Test
testCases.description: Verifies the functionality of the remember me feature for returning users.
steps: Navigate to login page as a new user
Enter valid credentials and check remember me option
